description: Location of shipwrecks in the North Sea and Zeescheldt until 2018. The map is based on information collected by http://www.maritieme-archeologie.be/. "Maritime Heritage" manages a large amount of information about the maritime heritage in Flanders. This information deals with wrecks, maritime structures and sites as well as with objects and events that are linked to a find.

name: Shipwrecks (Belgium, 2018)
